### Data

#### About the data

A data frame for....

Download data: [BullRiders.csv](BullRiders.csv)

Data Source: <a href="https://courses.edx.org/c4x/UTAustinX/UT.7.01x/asset/BullRiders.csv" target="_blank">Bull Riding Data Set</a>

<details>

<summary><b>Variable Descriptions</b></summary>

| **Variable**      | **Description**                                              |
|-------------------|--------------------------------------------------------------|
| `Rider`           | name of the pro. bull rider                                  |
| `PBRank`          | bull rider's ranking                                         |
| `YearBorn`        | birth year of the bull rider                                 |
| `Height`          | bull rider's height                                          |
| `Weight`          | bull rider's weight                                          |
| `YearsPro`        | number of years bull rider has been pro                      |
| `Season`          | year season takes place                                      |
| `Events`          | number of events each bull rider has participated in         |
| `BuckOuts`        | number of falls or times rider thrown off bull               |
| `Rides`           | number of rides                                              |
| `CupPoints`       | riders points towards the Cup/trophy                         |
| `place`           | riders ranking in competition                                |
| `RidePer`         | percent of their rides that were a success                   |
| `Wins`            | total number of wins                                         |
| `Top5`            | number of times rider placed in the top 5                    |
| `Top10`           | number of times rider placed in the top 10                   |
| `FinalPoints`     | total points for the season                                  |
| `Earnings`        | total earnings for the season                                |


</details>
